articles.description: In the past 12 months, HAL has declared an equity dividend amounting to Rs 30 per share, which results in a dividend yield of 1.05 per cent.

articles.title: India to Splurge $12 Billion on Airports as Travel Rebounds - Bloomberg
articles.description: India will spend about 980 billion rupees ($12 billion) over the next two years on airports, with airline orders for hundreds of new planes to meet resurgent travel demand putting pressure on existing infrastructure.

articles.title: ADP, GMR Airports Infrastructure to merge joint venture With GMR - Moneycontrol
articles.description: ADP and GMR Airports Infrastructure own 49% and 51%, respectively, of the unlisted GMR Airports Ltd., according to a statement Sunday from the French company, which operates Paris’s Charles de Gaulle and Orly.
articles.content:
Aéroports de Paris and GMR Airports Infrastructure Ltd. agreed to fold their joint-venture company into GMR, giving ADP a liquid stake in a business that owns airfields in India.
